sub_title: Urban and Regional Planner | Urban Governance & Finance Specialist | Erasmus University Rotterdam |
summary: I have been working in the field of urban development and management for over 13 years in Bangladesh. I obtained a master's degree in urban management and development (urban environment, sustainability and climate change) from IHS, Erasmus University in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

education.field_of_study: Urban Management & Development (Major in Urban Environment, Sustainability & Climate Change)

education.degree_name: Master in Urban and Regional Planning
Bachelor of Urban and Regional Planning

company.name: Regional Municipal Support Unit (RMSU), Local Government Engineering Department (LGED)

profile_positions.location: Level-06, LGED Bhaban, 1012 CDA Avenue, Sholoshohor, Chattogram, Bangladesh
profile_positions.company: Regional Municipal Support Unit (RMSU), Local Government Engineering Department (LGED)
profile_positions.description:
Activities performed:
-	Preparation of Operation Guidelines (OG) for Upazila and Paurashava governance and administration for multiple LGED projects.
-	As part of the OG implementation, monitoring and evaluation forms are being prepared and enforced at the Upazila and Paurashava level.
-	Develop more detailed OG guidance and monitor implementation performance at the Upazila and Paurashava level. 
-	Prepare a periodic monitoring and evaluation report on the performance of Upazila and Paurashava based on OG of urban projects. 
-	Based on existing software, monitor and evaluate the ICT performance of Paurashava's various departments, including administration, accounting, taxation, and engineering.
-	Based on the M&E report, create a yearly plan for Upazila and Paurashava governance capacity program. 
-	Preparing a training manual and providing training in both Bengali and English to LGUs’ under the RMSU Chattogram Region LGED on various Upazila and Paurashava Governance & Administration issues. 
-	Plan and coordinate an overseas training program for various Upazila and Paurashava officials. 
-	Providing post-training/workshop support to LGUs’ at the field level and regularly monitoring their post-training performance (Field visit).
-	Develop different form for OG based on monitoring and evaluations.
-	Prepare M&E guidance for Upazila, Paurashava, PIO, MSU, and PMO.
-	Prepare various monitoring and progress reports for the Project Management Office (PMO) and the MSU, Headquarters, LGED Dhaka.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Director (Urban Governance and Planning)

company.name: Nippon Koei Co., LTD (NK), 5-4 Kojimachi Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo 102-8539, Japan.

profile_positions.company: Nippon Koei Co., LTD (NK), 5-4 Kojimachi Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo 102-8539, Japan.
profile_positions.description:
Main Project features: Preparation of Master Plan for Upazila and Paurashava, Township Development, Identification of Projects and Sub-projects and Field Visit and Survey.
Activities performed:
Working as National Consultant for the NK in the implementation of the Preparatory Survey on UDCGP & SCRDP. Major responsibilities were:
-	Mainly played the role of "Coordinator" for the National Experts team in the implementation of the Project.
-	Data collection and analysis related to Paurashava and Upazila governance for UDCGP & SCRDP preparatory survey works.
-	Providing support on preparation of Project Profile Reports.
-	Planning for the governance component to be applied for the project.
-	Site visits along with or without international experts for interviewing the key stakeholders to collect detailed information for report writing.
-	Compilation and tabulation of the data and information on Paurashava and Upazila governance and administration
-	Coordination (sometimes supervision) with other national experts, Upazila and Paurashava officials for project works.
-	Writing and compilation of reports on LGUs’ administration and governance.
-	Writing and compilation of other reports assigned by team leader and deputy team leader.
-	Other instructions by the team leader, deputy team leader, urban planners (meeting notes, attendance list, and other technical directions).
profile_positions.title: National Consultant (Urban Governance and Planning Specialist)

profile_positions.location: Road No: 01, New DOHS, Mohakhali, Dhaka-1206, Bangladesh
profile_positions.description:
Main Project features: Preparation Upazila and Paurashava Development Plan, Reviewed Master Plan, Identification of Project, Prepare Community Action Plan (CAP), and Field Survey.
Activities performed:
-	Maintaining Liaison with various entities relating to the project especially, LGD, Upazila Parishad, Paurashava and different departments of Government relating to Upazila Parishad and Paurashava.
-	Provide support in drafting Mid- and Long-term Strategy for Upazila Parishad and Paurashava Governance Improvement; Guidelines for Upazila and Paurashava Integrated Development Planning.
-	Mid- and Long-term Training Plan for Upazila Parishads’ and Paurashavas’ Governance and Functionaries.
-	Prepare different progress report on implementation status of Governance Improvement and Capacity Development (GICD) program based on OG.

company.name: Neptune Land Development Limited (A sister concern of United Group)

profile_positions.location: Gulshan Center Point, Plot # 23-26, Road # 46, 90, 91, Gulshan- 2, Dhaka- 1212.
profile_positions.company: Neptune Land Development Limited (A sister concern of United Group)
profile_positions.description:
Main Project features: Township Development, Landuse Plan, Land Development, Consultation Meeting
Activities performed:
-	Preparation of Layout Plan for Two Township Development Projects within Dhaka city:
Prepare Traffic Circulation Plan, Storm Sewer Drainage Plan, Gas Distribution Network Plan, Plan of Road Network, Electricity Distribution Network Plan, Sewage Network Plan, Water Supply Network Plan, Subdivision Plan and Site Plan. Each of these plans are prepared using CAD & GIS. Major tasks include-
	Collect all basic information regarding plan preparation, carry out relevant studies, prepare reports and maps, prepare GIS database.
	Prepare land use plan that guides physical as well as economic development of the area over the next 50 years.
	Prepare detailed traffic and transportation management plan giving equal attention to both traffic demand management and facility operation management.
	Prepare traffic impact assessment report
-	Keeping All of the Records Relating to Land Procurement
Land procurement is the initial task for any land development project. After every parcel of land procurement the database and associated maps need to be updated accordingly. Information relating to Mutation and Land Tax is updated at a regular interval. 
-	Maintain Liaison with Various Government Authorities
Some NOCs (No Objection Certificate) are required for any land development project that are issued by concerned regulatory authorities. Department of Environment (DoE), DC Office, Dhaka Transport Coordination Authority (DTCA), Dhaka Electric Supply Company (DESCO), Geological Survey of Bangladesh (GSB), Dhaka WASA (Water and Sanitation Authority) etc. issues their own NOCs. To collect the NOCs and renewing them is an important task.
profile_positions.title: Town Planner

profile_positions.location: EPC Centre, 7/4, Block-A, Lalmatia, Dhaka-1207, Bangladesh
profile_positions.description:
Main Project features: Preparation of Master Plan, Data Analysis and Compilation report, Prepared Report, Public hearing/ Consultation Meeting.
Activities performed:
-	Development of Operation Guidelines (OG) of master plan for improving LGU governance and administration.
-	Monitoring and evaluation forms were being produced and implemented at LGUs level as part of the OG implementation for master plan.
-	Developed OG guidance that is more specific and keep track on LGU level governance improvement plan implementation.
-	Worked as an expert to assist LGU in improving the performance of administration and governance as per requirement of DTIDP project.
-	Prepare different progress report on implementation status of Governance Improvement and Capacity Development (GICD) program based on OG.
-	Prepared 5 years Development Plan (DP) and Community Action Plan (CAP) for Slum Improvement as a part of Master Plan.
-	Assisted LGU to prepare the relevant section of the UGIAP implementation plan.
-	Provided strategic suggestions on decisions related to project implementation.
-	Coordinated with LGED office Personnel, Internal and external communication of the project with stakeholders.
